about_the_game: You've heard the saying "dress for the job you want, not the one you have". Nowhere else is that more true than when trying to pull off the perfect heist. Dress for success with the Syntax Error Tailor Pack.

content_descriptors.notes: PAYDAY 3 contains repeated displays of gun violence, including the shooting of civilians and law enforcement. PAYDAY 3 references alcohol and tobacco as well as illegal drugs in a lighthearted way.

detailed_description: You've heard the saying "dress for the job you want, not the one you have". Nowhere else is that more true than when trying to pull off the perfect heist. Dress for success with the Syntax Error Tailor Pack.
